about_the_game:
Diverse Airports
A wide range of airports of various sizes and structures awaits you, each presenting a unique challenge for your team. From small regional airports to massive international terminals, you'll need to rebuild them from scratch. You'll face diverse tasks when recreating each airport, and only your management skills and creative approach will turn them into successful air traffic centers again.

Design and Renovation
Plan different zones of the airport, optimize passenger flows, develop modern passenger halls, customs points, runways, and other facilities. Choose from a variety of design elements to create a unique and functional airport.

Team Management
To undertake the airport renovation, you'll need assistance. Assemble a team of various specialists such as architects, engineers, interior designers, and workers to ensure the quality execution of the work. Manage the budget, monitor resources to successfully complete the project.

Realism
The game recreates the atmosphere of a real airport, emphasizing details and realistic graphics. Passengers will react to changes in the environment, and your airport will be evaluated based on various parameters such as safety, efficiency, and passenger satisfaction.

Challenges and Rewards
Complete various tasks and challenges to earn resources and improve your skills. Successfully accomplishing tasks will bring you rewards and unlock new opportunities for airport development.

name: Airport Renovator Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 | AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 760 or AMD Radeon™ R7 260x with 2GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590/AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or greater
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 with 3GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: "Airport Renovator Simulator" is a game that allows you to engage in airport reconstruction! In this captivating game, you have the opportunity to transform an old, outdated airport into a modern and functional air transportation hub and begin serving thousands of people every day.
